name: Russian Minibus Simulator 3D
description:
Russian Minibus Simulator 3D is the best minibus simulator that will offer you the chance to feel like a real Russian minibus driver.

Smooth controls, realistic car physics and damage, addictive gameplay are waiting for you! Try to become the best minibus driver in the Russian City and Village!

Meet our player Russian Ivan who is new to the City and want to explore it, but has no cash. Tired of robbery and car theft, waiting for the police chase, Ivan took a job at the minibus driver. Help Ivan to become the best driver of the coolest minibus in the Russian city!

Features:
- Realistic physics minibus taxi and other vehicles
- Excellent detailed realistic passengers / pedestrians with well developed animations
- Unique routes and fines accident
- Intelligent Transport System traffic - the legend of the Russian car industry such as Lada and UAZ
- A realistic system of traffic lights and gas stations
- Choose from a variety of minibus - Gazel minibus and foreign cars
- This Russian city and Village - a taste of the Motherland!
- Smooth Control with the arrow keys, accelerometer or steering wheel!
- Realistic damage of minibus
- Tuning cars
- Radio with three stations - Rock, Rap and Electro
- Camera with thee views: salon and other kinds!
- Incredible 3D graphics, explore the world!
- Addictive gameplay!

You want to feel like a Russian Minibus Driver? Then Russian Minibus Simulator 3D - your choice!
